song.englishname: O Praise Him (All This For A King)

english.segment1: Turn your ear. To Heaven and hear. The noise inside. The sound of angels. The sound of angels songs. And all this for a King. We could join and sing. "All to Christ the King!"
english.segment2: How constant. How divine. This song of ours will rise. Oh, how constant. How divine. This love of ours will rise. Will rise..
english.segment3: CHORUS: O praise Him!. O praise Him!. He is Holy!. He is Holy, yeah!
english.segment4: Turn your gaze. To Heaven and raise. A joyous noise. Oh, the sound of salvation come. The sound of rescued ones. And all this for a king. Angles join to sing. "All for Christ the King!"
english.segment6: Oh la la la la la..
english.segment7: O pra-ise Him!. O pra-ise Him!. He is Ho-ly!. He is Ho-ly!
english.segment8: How infininte and sweet. This love so rescuing. Oh how infinitely sweet. This great love that has redeemed. As one, we sing..
english.segment9: "Hallelujah!. Hallelujah!. He is Ho-ly!. He is Ho-ly!" [2x]
english.segment10: O pra-ise Him!. O pra-ise Him!. He is Ho-ly!. He is Ho-ly!
english.segment11: Oh, La la la la la la..
english.segment12: "Hallelujah!. Hallelujah!. He is Ho-ly!. He is Ho-ly!"
english.segment13: O pra-ise Him!. O pra-ise Him!. He is Ho-ly!. He is Ho-ly!
english.segment14: Oh la la la la la la..
